ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the planned time poi
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the planned time point for skin response measurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the planned time point labels for skin response, if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRTPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. See SDTMIG for additional information on representing time points. Time point anchors SRTPTREF (text description) and SRRFTDTC (date/time) may be needed, as well as SDTMIG variables SRTPTNUM, SRELTM.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Planned time point are needed to differentiate multiple sequential assessments. It is recommended that time points should be pre-printed on the CRF rather than collected in a field that requires the site to enter text. If the form is laid out as a grid, then words such as Planned Time Point can be included as the column header.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-10 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.23.18
